game.name: Elderwood Online
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 전략, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어
game.shortDescription: Dive back into the essence of MMORPGs with Elderwood Online, where we pay homage to the beloved classics of the late '90s and early 2000s, infused with a touch of today's innovation. Elderwood Online marries the nostalgia of golden-age MMOs with fresh adventures and discoveries.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive back into the essence of MMORPGs with Elderwood Online, where we pay homage to the beloved classics of the late '90s and early 2000s, infused with a touch of today's innovation. Elderwood Online marries the nostalgia of golden-age MMOs with fresh adventures and discoveries.
